doc:
Phil Silvers https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phil_Silvers 0 Phil Silvers (May 11, 1911 – November 1, 1985) was an American entertainer and comedic actor, known as "The King of Chutzpah". He starred in The Phil Silvers Show, a 1950s sitcom set on a U.S. Army post in which he played Master Sergeant Ernest (Ernie) Bilko. Phil_Silvers ( May_11_,_1911 – November_1_,_1985 ) was an_American_entertainer and comedic_actor , known as " The_King of Chutzpah_" . He starred in The_Phil_Silvers_Show , a_1950s_sitcom set on a_U.S._Army_post in which he played Master_Sergeant_Ernest_(_Ernie_)_Bilko .
